name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】 1st generation 7th anniversary♪♪ 【 #電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言 】 [wrsUn4IQmZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Introduction of the final announcer, Aki Rosenthal, by the other members.
Aki Rosenthal announces the release of songs from her musical 'Fantasia of Bremen' and an upcoming MV.
Natsuiro Matsuri concludes the announcement segment.
The members discuss their 7th anniversary, transitioning into their 8th year, and give their final sign-offs.
The stream ending card with commemorative artwork and messages.

subtitles.original: あ、そして最後はアキちゃん！
subtitles.english: And finally, Aki-chan!

subtitles.original: はいはいはいはいはい！
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes!

subtitles.original: アキロゼのでーす！ なんと、
subtitles.english: It's Akirose! Surprisingly,

subtitles.original:
MUSICAL Fantasia of Bremen
音楽 それは私たちの人生に彩りを、勇気を、
そして夢を与えてくれる不思議な魔法
これはそんな音楽の力を信じた動物たちの冒険の物語
6月1日24時～ リリース
subtitles.english:
MUSICAL Fantasia of Bremen
Music—it is a mysterious magic that brings color, courage,
and dreams to our lives.
This is the story of the adventures of animals who believed in the power of music.
Released on June 1st at 24:00.

subtitles.original: 2024年かな？ 自分の生誕祭の時にお披露目しました、
subtitles.english: Was it 2024? During my birthday celebration, I revealed...

subtitles.original: ミュージカル「Fantasia of Bremen」の曲が、ついに発売になります！
subtitles.english: the songs from the musical "Fantasia of Bremen" are finally going on sale!

subtitles.original: わー！ おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: なります！ この後24時リリース予定なので、
subtitles.english: They are! They're scheduled for release at 24:00 today,

subtitles.original: ぜひいっぱい聴いたり、歌ってみたり踊ってみたりして、楽しんでもらえたらなと思ってます！
subtitles.english: so I hope you'll enjoy them by listening to them a lot, or maybe trying to sing and dance along!

subtitles.original: あと、ミュージックビデオとして、そのミュージカル部分だけ切り取ったものも上げようと思ってるので、
subtitles.english: Also, I'm planning to upload a music video that cuts out just the musical part,

subtitles.original: アキロゼのチャンネルもぜひ見てください！
subtitles.english: so please check out Akirose's channel too!

subtitles.original: 見てねー！
subtitles.english: Watch it!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: はい！ 以上、告知タイムでしたー！
subtitles.english: Okay! That was the end of the announcement time!

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、もう7周年迎えて、
subtitles.english: And so, having reached our 7th anniversary,

subtitles.original: え、8周年ですか？ 明日から。
subtitles.english: eh, is it our 8th anniversary? Starting tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 明日からだね。
subtitles.english: It starts tomorrow.

subtitles.original: おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ということで、ちびっこに例えると中学校2年生。
subtitles.english: So, if we were kids, we'd be in the 2nd year of middle school.

subtitles.original: 我々は中2！
subtitles.english: We're 8th graders!

subtitles.original: 中学2年生になったー！
subtitles.english: We've become 2nd-year middle schoolers!

subtitles.original: あー！ すごーい！
subtitles.english: Ah! Amazing!

subtitles.original: 封印が解けるような、眩しい...
subtitles.english: Like a seal being broken, dazzling...

subtitles.original: 眩しい！ なんかこれ以上解き放たれてたらまずい！
subtitles.english: Dazzling! If we're unleashed any further, it'll be bad!

subtitles.original: どうなっちゃうのー！
subtitles.english: What's going to happen!?

subtitles.original: はい、これからも、のんびりやっていく1期生でございますけどもね、
subtitles.english: Well, we'll continue to be the 1st generation that takes things at our own pace,

subtitles.original: これからも楽しく活動していきますので、皆様よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: but we'll keep having fun with our activities, so please keep supporting us!

subtitles.original: お願いしまーす！ 頑張ろうぜー！
subtitles.english: Please do! Let's do our best!

subtitles.original: はい、それではですね、またそれぞれの配信でお会いしましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright then, we'll see you again in our respective streams!

subtitles.original: はーい！ せーの、
subtitles.english: Okay! Ready,

subtitles.original: ばいばーい！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original:
7周年ありがとう！
これからも最強じゃなきゃ許しません！
浮気厳禁！
subtitles.english:
Thank you for the 7th anniversary!
I won't forgive you if we aren't the best from now on too!
Cheating is strictly forbidden!
